529e9996-34d1-4413-a84a-6de97cdeb5a4.description: Achievers of the Employment Readiness badge possess the qualities and attitudes that employers require for the workplace. These candidates possess the employability skills of workplace professionalism, quality customer service, communication, workplace safety, business technology and social interaction. They are effective communicator; excellent team players, respect time management, and demonstrate a willingness to learn.
529e9996-34d1-4413-a84a-6de97cdeb5a4.name: Employment Readiness: CPIBS00319 (Customized Certification)

badge_template_activities.title: This individual has completed an assessed continuous Practical Evaluations and a Written Assessment in all unit area of Professionalism, Customer Service, Workplace Safety Using Business technology, Managing Social interaction, and Preparing for work.

1c917d5a-087f-4254-96b9-b036b7e942ea.description: Achievers of the Quality Service Delivery badge possess the knowledge and understanding of customer service concepts, techniques and practices. They are empowered to address customer complaints and enquiries to resolve customer related issues. These candidates are able to explore the importance of customer service to the organization and examine the role they play in developing and maintaining a culture of excellence by delivering first class customer service to all.
1c917d5a-087f-4254-96b9-b036b7e942ea.name: Quality Service Delivery: CPEBS00119 (Customized Certification)

badge_template_activities.title: This individual has completed simulation, role-play discussion in business etiquette.

This individual has completed an assessed role-play, group discussion, video presentation and case studies in the developing a customer-friendly approach to service and handling difficult customers and complaint.
This individual has completed an assessed group discussion, simulation, story- telling and observe video presentation in managing emotions in the workplace.
This individual has evaluated a case study, participate in games, observe video presentation and completed discussions focusing on team building and teamwork.

9f5d46c0-ff36-4ce0-90ef-b35d946a0665.description: Achievers of the Fundamentals of Customer Engagement badge possess an awareness of the occupational health and safety issues within the customer engagement environment. These candidates are efficient users of modern business process outsourcing technologies. They are excellent team players, communicators, critical-thinkers, problem–solvers and are socially aware and appreciative of cultural diversity.
9f5d46c0-ff36-4ce0-90ef-b35d946a0665.name: Fundamentals of Customer Engagement: CPIBPO119 (Customized Certification)

alignments.name: BSBWOR0012A - Work effectively with others
alignments.description: This unit deals with the knowledge, skills and attitudes required to work cooperatively with others and deal effectively with issues, problems and conflict

alignments.name: BSBCCOR0031A - Work In a customer engagement environment
alignments.description: This unit deals with the skills and knowledge required to participate in customer engagement operations. It includes relating own role to customer contact operations, reflecting on personal performance, maintaining a professional approach to employment and working in teams.

alignments.name: BSSCRE0221C – Observe ethical practices
alignments.description: This unit deals with the knowledge, skills and attitudes required to observe ethical practices. It includes protecting the interest of customers; making correct representation and maintain good work practices

alignments.name: ITCCOR0021D – Comply with occupational safety and health procedures
alignments.description: This unit deals with the knowledge, skills and attitudes required by employees to comply with occupational safety and health procedures in the workplace. It includes following safe work practices; maintaining personal safety standards; assessing risk; and following emergency safety procedures.

alignments.name: BSBBAD0081C – Develop keyboarding skills
alignments.description: This unit deals with the knowledge, skills and attitudes required to develop basic keyboarding skills using touch-typing techniques in a broad range of settings. It applies to individuals who perform a range of mainly routine tasks and generally work under direct supervision using limited practical skills and fundamental knowledge.

alignments.name: BPOCUE0012A – Prepare for work in a customer engagement environment
alignments.description: This unit deals with the knowledge, skills and attitudes required to participate in customer engagement operations. It includes relating own role to customer engagement operations; reflecting on personal performance; maintaining a professional approach to employment

alignments.name: BPOCUE0022A – Conduct customer engagement (inbound and outbound)
alignments.description: This unit deals with the knowledge, skills and attitudes required to participate in customer engagement operations. It includes relating own role to customer engagement operations; reflecting on personal performance; maintaining a professional approach to employment.

alignments.name: BPOCUS0012A – Deliver service to customer
alignments.description: This unit deals with the knowledge, skills and attitudes required to deliver all aspects of customer service at an introductory level. It includes creating a relationship with customers, identifying their needs, delivering services or products and processing customer feedback.

alignments.name: ITCCOR0011D – Communicate effectively in a customer engagement centre
alignments.description: This unit deals with the knowledge, skills and attitudes required to handle communication between and within different cultural contexts that may involve the skill of accent neutralization as well as other communication competencies

alignments.name: ITCCOR0011D – Handle telephone calls
alignments.description: This unit deals with the knowledge, skills and attitude required for the development and use of emotional intelligence to increase self-awareness, self-management, social awareness and relationship management in the context of the workplace.

alignments.name: BSBDIV0011A –Observe cultural differences of customers
alignments.description: This unit deals with the knowledge, skills and attitude required to work respectfully with people from diverse social and cultural groups and the awareness required for effective communication and cooperation with persons of diverse cultures

badge_template_activities.title: This individual has completed an assessed role-play and discussion on ethical considerations.
This individual has completed Drill and Practice for Keyboarding Skills.
This individual has completed an assessed demonstration of multitasking skills (telephone and keyboarding) and handling inbound/outbound customer engagement.
This individual has completed an assessed demonstration of handling emotional triggers via a Simulation Exercise that includes vocal technique & listening skills assessments.
This individual has evaluated a case study and completed a discussion focusing on cultural sensitivity and cooperative learning.
This individual has completed a role-play discussion  in Consumer Behaviour.

skills.name: Diversity And Working With Different Cultures

c2fcfc2e-c9b0-4d6a-9357-ea3f98b6c2fa.description: Earners of the Fundamentals of make-up Artistry badge possess a comprehensive knowledge of the fundamentals of make-up Artistry. Candidates are able to function independently as make-up artists in a retail store, as a residential make-up artist in a salon or spa as a member of a production team or as a freelance artist. These candidates are excellent critical thinkers, problem-solvers, team players and good communicators.
c2fcfc2e-c9b0-4d6a-9357-ea3f98b6c2fa.name: Fundamentals of Make-up Artistry: CPICS00119 (Customized Certification)

badge_template_activities.title: This individual has completed an assessed role-play, discussions and demonstrations in image consultancy.
This individual has completed an assessed demonstration and guided practice; role-play psychometric assessment and case studies in make-up artistry.

4bd5d734-8c71-45c6-bdea-b0aba0084349.description: Earners of the Data Entry Processor badge are efficient operators of a word processing application, a spreadsheet application and a presentation package. Individuals with this badge possess the skills necessary to create, edit and share documents with images, spreadsheets and presentation.
4bd5d734-8c71-45c6-bdea-b0aba0084349.name: Data Entry Processor (Job Certification) J02ITI20119

alignments.name: ITICOR0241A - Operate a word processing application (basic)
alignments.description: The knowledge, skills and attitude required to operate a word- processing applications and perform basic operations, including creating and formatting documents, creating tables and printing labels. It applies to individuals in the workplace using fundamental knowledge of word-processing under direct supervision or with limited responsibility.

alignments.name: ITIDAT0171A - Operate a spreadsheet application (basic)
alignments.description: The skills and knowledge required to perform basic operations using a spreadsheet application and create a document. This unit applies to individuals operating in the information and communication industry.

alignments.name: ITIMED0261A – Operate a presentation package (basic)
alignments.description: The skills and knowledge required to operate presentation applications and applies to individuals operating in the information and communication industry.

badge_template_activities.title: Earners of this badge have completed a face to face practical course in Data Entry Processing, completing drills and practice for Keyboarding Skills.

Earners of this badge have successfully passed practical, written and oral test and portfolio review assessments in operating a word processing application, a spreadsheet application and a presentation package, completing drills and practice for Keyboarding Skills.

ddfd9e89-b2f2-487c-ae32-70912454f8e5.description: Earners of the ICT Technical Support badge possess a comprehensive knowledge of the fundamentals and theoretical foundations of personal computer repairs and networking. Candidates are able to use the tools and techniques for computer software, hardware maintenance and network administration. These candidates are exposed to the functionality of hardware and software components as well as suggested best practices in computer maintenance and safety issues.
ddfd9e89-b2f2-487c-ae32-70912454f8e5.name: ICT Technical Support: CPEBP00119 (Customized Certification)

badge_template_activities.title: This individual has completed an assessed simulation, demonstrations, practical exercises and online quizzes in the personal computer trouble shooting and hardware components.
This individual has completed an assessed individual presentation speech drills; written quizzes in non-verbal for voice and speech, consonant accuracy.
This individual has completed an assessed written and reading test; and oral conversation test in vowel production and speech fluency.
This individual has completed an assessed role play/discussion; simulation; psychometric assessment in customer engagement.

skills.name: Install Clean And Repair Computer Hardware

f5cc580d-6779-431e-8556-8e6b52131875.description: Earners of the Phlebotomy badge are competent in drawing blood as a therapeutic or diagnostic measure for treatment and prevention of disease. Earners have successfully completed 490 hours training programme in the theoretical and practical activities and techniques of collecting, labeling and transporting blood specimens for lab analysis.
f5cc580d-6779-431e-8556-8e6b52131875.name: Phlebotomy: CPECS00119 (Customized Certification)

badge_template_activities.title: Earners of this badge have attended 490 hours-face to face, practical and  practicum course in Phlebotomy.

Successfully passed practical demonstration, direct observation of processes and procedures oral and/or written questioning in Introduction to Phlebotomy and Professional Ethics, Communication and Interpersonal Relationships, Medical Terminologies, Decontamination and Waste Disposal, Anatomy and Physiology, Guidelines for Phlebotomy Practice and Quality Assurance, Occupational health and safety, Features and Use of Phlebotomy Equipment, Clinical Laboratory Procedures and Phlebotomy Techniques.
Earners of this badge have successfully passed an individual external final written and practical assessment.

3c5d8a59-e0a5-424c-b85a-8eb30a60dde1.description: Earners of this badge are competent in bar operations and basic mixology, knowledgeable in methods to create mixes according to individual drink families and the base ingredients and in practical demonstration of methods mixing of traditional cocktails. Earners are competent bartenders skilled in the art of listening, creating and maintaining relationships, and responsible food management way to prevent food poisoning and intoxication and how hygiene and grooming impacts food safety.
3c5d8a59-e0a5-424c-b85a-8eb30a60dde1.name: Introduction to Bar Operations and Mixology: CPETH00219 (Customized Certification)

badge_template_activities.title: Earners of this badge have attended 36 hours of face to face and practical demonstration in Introduction to Bar Operations and Mixology.

Earners of this badge have successfully passed practical, written, role play, simulation and presentation final assessments in the Role of the Bartender, Physical Aspects of Bar Operations, Sanitation and Food Safety, Psychological Aspects of Bar Operations, Introduction to Inventory Management and Mixology.

204e5d9b-f6fc-41ea-bdf3-b0485f237692.description: Earners of the Beaded Jewellery and Accessories badge are competent in making a variety of Jewellery. Earners have successfully completed a training programme in the theoretical and practical activities of jewellery making and have the required knowledge, skills and attitude to become Crafted Jewellery experts.
204e5d9b-f6fc-41ea-bdf3-b0485f237692.name: Beaded Jewellery and Accessories: CPEEC00219 (Customized Certification)

badge_template_activities.title: Earners of this badge have successfully completed the Beaded Jewellery and Accessories Course.
Earners of this badge have successfully passed practical and oral assessments in crafted jewellery using beads, rings and earrings, key rings and pendants and necklaces and bracelets.
Earners of this badge have successfully passed an individual final assessment and participated in group discussions.

64da250f-903e-40c9-8d9f-e73447a9d82b.description: Achievers of the Customer Care Representative badge are efficient customer service representative who are excellent team players, communicators, critical-thinkers, problem–solvers and are socially aware and appreciative of cultural diversity.
64da250f-903e-40c9-8d9f-e73447a9d82b.name: Customer Care Representative (Job Certification) J01BSB20217

alignments.name: BSBCOR0091B Receive visitors
alignments.description: The skills. knowledge and attitude required to receive visitors to an organization, while keeping set rules and procedures.

alignments.name: BSBCOR0161B Handle telephone calls
alignments.description: The skills. knowledge and attitude required for telephone techniques in answering and receiving calls to disseminate and receive information for smooth flowing of communication in an organization.

alignments.name: BSBCUS0022A Maintain customer relationship
alignments.description: The knowledge, skills, and attitudes needed to maintain an ongoing relationship with customers and retain the business customer base.

alignments.name: FSFCUS0152A Process customer complaints
alignments.description: The knowledge, skills and attitudes needed in the receipt and handling of complaints/negative feedback about financial products or services, whether formal or informal, and resolving the complaint by taking corrective action or referring the complaint to appropriate personnel for resolution.

alignments.name: BSBCUS0032A Build customer relations
alignments.description: The skills, knowledge and attitude required to create a positive impression and establish and maintain rapport with the customer.

alignments.name: BSBCUS0041A Communicate effectively in a business environment
alignments.description: The skills and knowledge required to effectively manage the communication process with the customer and the service provider.

alignments.name: FSFCUS0183A Maintain customer database
alignments.description: The competencies required to maintain the organization's customer database accurately and in accordance with the organization's procedures.

alignments.name: FSFCUS0113A Resolve customer disputes
alignments.description: The skills and knowledge involved in resolving disputes between customers and organizations.

alignments.name: BSBCUS0011A Deliver a professional service to customer
alignments.description: The knowledge, skills and attitudes required for delivering quality and professional service to customers. It includes clarifying and meeting customer's needs and expectations.

alignments.name: BSBCUS0082A Process general inquires and provide assistance to customers
alignments.description: The knowledge, skills and attitudes required for delivering quality and professional service to customers.

badge_template_activities.title: Earners of this badge have successfully passed an individual final written and practical assessment in Customer Service and have participated in group activities.

Earners have successfully passed practical, written and oral: Third-party Report and Observance of work processes assessments in Receiving visitors, Handle telephone calls, Maintaining Customer Relationship, Processing Customer Complaints, Build Customer Relations and Communicate Effectively in a Business Environment, Resolve Customer Disputes, Deliver a Professional Service to Customers, Processing General Inquires and Provide Assistance to Customers and Maintaining customer database

340301e6-52c7-45cb-bfa3-d478649750de.description: Earners of the Introduction to Techniques of Video Production badge are competent in the use of the cameras, lights, microphones and digital video editing equipment. Earners have successfully completed 60 hours training programme in the theory and practice of pre-production, production and post production aspects of video production.
340301e6-52c7-45cb-bfa3-d478649750de.name: Introduction to Techniques Of Video Production CPECU00120 (Customized Certification)

badge_template_activities.title: Earners of this badge have attended 60 hours-theory, practical and final project in Video Production.

Earners of this badge have successfully passed practical demonstration, project, written questioning in Fundamentals of Video Production, Two Pre-Production Video Operations, Production Research and Script, Production Camera Techniques, Sound Record Techniques, Basic 3 Point Lighting and Post Video Production.
Earners of this badge have successfully passed an individual final project, written and practical assessment.

e8b0de1c-7205-4597-8aef-ccc51a3c3ee5.description: Earners of the Preparing and Decorating Cakes and Pastries badge are competent to prepare and produce a variety of pastries and cakes, apply frosting and icings to cakes and pastry, presenting a variety of cake and pastry products, initiate a business venture in cakes and pastries and demonstrate a greater appreciation for health, hygiene and safety in the kitchen.
e8b0de1c-7205-4597-8aef-ccc51a3c3ee5.name: Preparing and Decorating Cakes and Pastries: CPITH00219 (Customized Certification)

alignments.name: THHCOR0041A Follow Workplace Hygiene Procedures
alignments.description: This unit deals with the knowledge, skills and attitudes required to use personal hygiene practices to prevent contamination of food that might cause food-borne illnesses. It requires the ability to follow predetermined organizational procedures and to identify and control food hazards.

alignments.name: THHPAT0542A Prepare and Produce Cakes
alignments.description: This unit deals with the knowledge, skills and attitudes required for the preparation and production of a range of basic cakes in a variety of establishments.

alignments.name: THHPAT0532A Prepare and Produce Pastries
alignments.description: This unit deals with the knowledge, skills and attitudes required for the preparation and production of a range of basic pastries in a variety of establishments.

alignments.name: THHPAT0772A Present Dessert
alignments.description: This unit deals with the knowledge, skills and attitudes required to apply the different styles of dessert presentation.

badge_template_activities.title: Earners of this badge have successfully passed Written test, Portfolio and Role Play in Preparing and Decorating Cakes and Pastries.

Earners of this badge have successfully passed an individual final assessment in Observation of work processes, Oral/Written test, Practical demonstration and Portfolio in Prepare and Produce Cakes, Prepare and Produce Pastries and Present Dessert.

7a1ae9b1-4190-4b55-817e-bff35292ae09.description: Earners of this Public Weather Observation badge have successfully completed training in the theory and practice in Real-Time information for the validation of daily Satellite Imagery, Ground-Truthing/Verification of RADAR reports, Automatic Weather Station Network density verification, Severe Weather events reporting, Flood reporting to establish threshold values for specific events/area.
7a1ae9b1-4190-4b55-817e-bff35292ae09.name: Public Weather Observation: CPEGC00119 (Customized Certification)

badge_template_activities.title: Earners of this badge has successfully completed final assessment in observation of cloud condition, weather events, visibility, temperature, wind, rainfall amount and atmospheric pressure to forecast the weather.

Earners of this badge have successfully passed practical, written and final assessments in Introduction to Drop Box & Importing Data into Dropbox, Cloud Observation and Observation Time, Estimation of Wind, Visibility and Precipitation Identification and Safety Measures for Public Weather Observers.
